extendedInfo.description: These are very useful Physics Formulas that serve as a quick reference.With this application you can use your travel time to study, or just have it as a quick reference when needed.It includes formulas on below topics:"Acceleration""Addition of Mutiple Vectors""Atomic Mass Unit & Electron Charge""Derivative of Vectors-Velocity""Dot Product or Scalar Product""Electron Value""Kinetic Energy""Mutiplication of Vector-Cross Product""Neutron Value""One Joule""one Volt""Polar Notation""Conversion :Polar to Rectangular""Formula : Power""Proton Value""Quadratic Equation""Rectangular Notation""Conversion :Rectangular to Polar""Velocity of Electron Average Power per unit area""Coulomb's Law""Deflection of particle in Electric Field""Electric Field due to disk charge""Electric Field due to Infinite Line of charge""Electric Field due to infinte sheet""Electric Field due to ring charge""Electric Field Outside Spherical Shell""Electric Field inside spherical shell""Electric Dipole""Electric Field""MainTopic-Electric Charges and Fields""Relationship k to abslon Capacitance Title""Cylindrical Capacitor""Electrical Energy stored in Capacitor""Electrical Power due to point charge""Flux""Gauss's Law""Maximun Charge on Capacitor""Potential Difference between two points""P E of pair of charges""Parellel Plate Capacitor""Spherical Capacitor""Work and Potential Capacitance Series Parellel""Charge or Voltage after t seconds""Charge per Unit Area""Current Density""Drift Speed""Energy Density""Kirchoff's Rules""Resistance""Resistivity""Time Constant""Variation of Resistance with Temperature Charge Particle in Magnetic Field""Force between conductors""Force on wire in Magnetic Field""Hall Effect""Magnetic Dipole Moment""Magnetic field around wire""Magnetic Field at center of Arc""Magnetic Field of solenoid""Magnetic Flux through closed Loop""Magnetic force on charge q""Magnetism Breif History""Magnetism Right Hand Rule""Torque on a Rectangular Loop Ampere's Law""Cylindrical Changing Magnetic Field""Electrical Energy stored in a Capacitor"and MORE...Useful for IIT JEE, AIEEE, etc.It also has formulas for College Grade/Higher Grade Students/School Students. The app is suitable for all levels of physics from high school to university and beyond.

reviews.comment: Not great but good apps . Not great because their are not explaining all phycis chapter.
